channel.title: CVE Feed for Trellix -- Trellix Endpoint Security (ENS) Web Control
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trellix -- Trellix Endpoint Security (ENS) Web Control

item.title: CVE-2024-0310|2024-08-01T18:04:49.037Z -- trellix -- trellix%20endpoint%20security%20%28ens%29%20web%20control
item.description: A content-security-policy vulnerability in ENS Control browser extension prior to 10.7.0 Update 15 allows a remote attacker to alter the response header parameter setting to switch the content security policy into report-only mode, allowing an attacker to bypass the content-security-policy configuration.
